channel.title: One question about custom items

item.title: One question about custom items
item.dc:creator: @d_man103456 d man103456
item.description:
@d_man103456 wrote:

Im editing a client and i added a green dragon chain body. I have this code

if(i == 16010)//item id { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wear"; class8.anIntArray156 = new int[5]; class8.anIntArray160 = new int[5]; class8.anIntArray156[0] = 914; class8.anIntArray160[0] = 999999; class8.anIntArray156[1] = 918; class8.anIntArray160[1] = 999999; class8.anIntArray156[2] = 922; class8.anIntArray160[2] = 999999; class8.anIntArray156[3] = 391; class8.anIntArray160[3] = 999999; class8.anIntArray156[4] = 917; class8.anIntArray160[4] = 999999; class8.anInt181 = 1100; class8.anInt190 = 568; class8.anInt198 = 0; class8.anInt204 = 0; class8.anInt169 = 0; class8.anInt194 = 2; class8.anInt165 = 3820; class8.anInt200 = 3821; class8.anInt174 = 3823; class8.anInt188 = 156; class8.anInt164 = 337; class8.anInt175 = -1; class8.anInt197 = -1; class8.aString170 = "Green Dragon Chain"; class8.aByteArray178 = "Green Dragon Chain".getBytes(); }
can some1 tell me how to make it into something like maybe a green dragon sheild? Also maybe what code t change to make it different colors TY come on i really need some help
